Scriptal.Name: Call Heli To LZ Coordinates
Scriptal.Description: Calls a support helicopter to an LZ to wait for the player. The Helicopter will be routed to the LZ closest to the coordinates provided.
Scriptal.EventFunctionTemplate: local tempHeliPos = |[1|TABLE]| GameObject.SendCommand( GameObject.GetGameObjectId( "TppHeli2", "SupportHeli" ), { id = "CallToLandingZoneAtPosition", position = Vector3(tempHeliPos[1], tempHeliPos[2], tempHeliPos[3]) } ) GameObject.SendCommand( GameObject.GetGameObjectId( "TppHeli2", "SupportHeli" ), { id = "SetTakeOffWaitTime", time = |[2|NUMBER]| } )

Choice.Name: Nearest Landing Zone (X, Y, Z Table Position)
Choice.Description: A table that contains 3 numbers for X, Y and Z coordinates. The helicopter will move to the LZ closest to the coordinates, so they do not need to be exact.

Choice.Name: Wait For Player Duration
Choice.Description: Once the helicopter arrives, wait at the LZ before deciding that the player is a no-show and leaving (in minutes). Set to 0 to wait forever.
